mapper.select: select T_CODE as tcode, PROGRESS_CD as progress, SUBJECT_CD as subj, EXTRA_PARAM as extra from em_teacher_page_master
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_information (delim, uDate, pageCode, pagePath, pageviews, uniquePageviews, sessions, bounces, totalEvents, entrances) values ('T', #{uDate}, #{pageCode}, #{pagePath}, #{pageviews}, #{uniquePageviews}, #{sessions}, #{bounces}, #{totalEvents}, #{entrances})
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_information where uDate = #{uDate} AND pagePath = #{pagePath}
mapper.select: select pageCode, sum(pageviews) as pageviews, sum(uniquePageviews) as uniquePageviews, sum(sessions) as sessions, sum(bounces) as bounces, sum(totalEvents) as totalEvents, sum(entrances) as entrances from tbl_information where delim='T' AND pageCode = #{seq} AND uDate >= #{startDate} AND uDate <= #{endDate} group by pageCode
